= About Me = 

Hello, my name is Darius Huntly, I'm a 18 year old student from <nowiki>[[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Neath_Port_Talbot|Neath]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wales|Wales]]</nowiki>, currently studying computer science at <nowiki>[[http://www.aber.ac.uk|Aberystwyth University]]</nowiki>. I'm a long time linux user, using many distributions including ubuntu, fedora and gentoo.
